group_1.textLeft: Then, if you'll excuse me.
Thank you so much for your valuable time.

group_1.textRight: ...Mmm. In the end, you still won't tell me?
How you "intend to change your response," that is.

group_1.textLeft: ...You are still curious about that?

group_1.textRight: Because you've been quiet since then, haven't you?
Don't you get bothered by incomplete information?

group_1.textLeft: ...I believe in the existence of the Kamihama Magia @Union.
Since Kamihama is such a big city, it does need @an autonomous organization.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, with this many Magical Girls, @there are bound to be problems.

group_1.textLeft: However...people get soft around @their fellow members.
When some things get too close, they seem to @disappear right in front of you...
Therefore, I would like to remain on the outside,
and watch the Kamihama Magia Union with @an objective and bird's eye view.

group_1.textRight: Is that why you won't let the other girls in @your team joinâ€•
so they wouldn't get too close?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I'd prefer to not gather all in one place...
That is, as a Magical Girl living in Kamihama,
I've always thought about what is best for the@Magical Girls in this city.
It would be ideal for everyone to be after the same @thing...
But sometimes that brings about complacency.
If something were to go wrong from the inside, @we would need help from the outside.
...What is it?

group_1.textRight: Nothing, I was just thinking... You're surpisingly @more compassionate than I thought.

group_1.textLeft: I am a warm-blooded human you know?
I don't want anyone close to me to be unhappy.

group_1.textRight: "People get soft around their fellow members"@...was it?
I understand... Everyone, they're all good girls.

group_1.textLeft: ...If anything, I'd say they're too good-hearted.
That is why I've kept my distance.
However, when Magical Girls start showing up from @the outside full of hostility,
the entire story changes.
Girls in my team have also voiced that they want @to join...
Join the Kamihama Magia Union as a team...
